Class ManageUser

java.lang.Object
manager.ManageUser
public class ManageUser extends Object
Service class for managing user-related operations.

      Updates an existing user's information.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to update.
      Returns:
      The updated user.
      Throws:

    • promoteUserToLibrarian

      public void promoteUserToLibrarian(Integer userId, boolean isSenior) throws Exception
      Promotes a user to the librarian role.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to promote.
      isSenior - Whether the user should be promoted to a senior librarian.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the user does not exist or is already a librarian.
